bugs.cf_release_notes:
Feature: A run of the Certification Test Suite generates a set of logs in JSON format. This feature extends the readability of the logs by creating a summary report in HTML format.

Reason: Enables the user of the Certification Test Suite and the Reviewer to quickly scan the generated report and identify areas of concern, errors and warnings.

Result (if any):
bugs.summary: [RFE] Create module to generate html test report from rhos-cts logs.
